title: MLB draft tracker live updates: Nationals select SS Eli Willits with No. 1 pick
description: Follow along for pick-by-pick coverage from Atlanta.
author: ESPN

title: Nats surprise at top of draft with SS Willits
description: The Nationals took HS shortstop Eli Willits with the No. 1 pick in the MLB draft, while Tyler Bremner went No. 2 to the Angels and LSU's Kade Anderson to the Mariners at No. 3.
author: Alden Gonzalez

title: 2025 MLB Draft takeaways: Surprise No. 1, Corona is king, Skenes support coming?
description: The first day of the 2025 MLB Draft featured some major early surprises – and three players from one prep school.

title: PSG coach Luis Enrique explains postgame altercation with Chelsea's João Pedro
description: In the minutes after Paris Saint-Germain lost the Club World Cup final, manager Luis Enrique swiped at Chelsea striker João Pedro.

title: Taylor completes Serrano trilogy as Marshall suffers upset defeat
description: Katie Taylor beat Amanda Serrano by unanimous decision to defend the undisputed super-lightweight championship and complete a clean sweep of three victories in their trilogy.

title: Sensational Sinner dethrones Alcaraz to seal maiden Wimbledon title
description: World No 1 Jannik Sinner dethroned two-time defending champion Carlos Alcaraz to seal his maiden Wimbledon title with a stylish four-set win.

title: England building 'urgency' - are they ready for Sweden?
description: England booked their place in the quarter-finals of Euro 2025 in style with a thumping victory over Wales - so are they ready to take the next step?

title: Trump, Coldplay and red carpets - was this Super Bowl or soccer?
description: From Donald Trump's role in the trophy presentation to Coldplay's half-time show, BBC Sport tries to make sense of the Club World Cup final.
